LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.label: M88 "Rocky"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.description: A USAC Marine Corps synthetic infantry unit. Designed to use 6.8mm family weapons and can wear human armor and helmets. Provides basic infantry support with moderate protection.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Cobalt.label: M7 "Cobalt"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Cobalt.description: A medium quadruped cargo dog with integrated machine gun. Features shotgun-resistant armor plating, cargo hauling capability, and smoke grenade deployment system.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.label: M939 "Paraman"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.description: A medium mechanized airborne unit resembling a gecko but more humanoid. Designed for rapid deployment operations with enhanced mobility and moderate firepower.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Gonk.label: XM11 "GONK"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Gonk.description: An experimental IFV-class combat platform. Armed with a high-energy plasma beam as primary weapon and equipped with Active Protection System. Features six-sided reactive armor plating on quadruped chassis.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Omaha.label: M1154E "OMAHA"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Omaha.description: An assault breacher vehicle analog with bipedal walker structure. Equipped with a mine plow for clearing obstacles and mine-clearing rocket launchers. Designed for breaching fortified positions.
